As a [ user X ], I want to [ do Y ], so that [ I can accomplish Z ].

| Must/Should/Could/Won't have |                      |                    |

## Pre-requisites
- [ ] Meet with the stakeholder to clarify the requirements
- [ ] Complete the requirements of this US
